hero_sub: Backend-focused Software Developer building full-stack web apps with Node.js, PostgreSQL, and modern frontend tools.
about_text: I hold an Associate Degree in Computer Science in Vancouver, BC. I focus on building backend and full-stack web applications, working with databases, and designing clean, maintainable systems. I enjoy solving real-world problems with code, continuously learning new technologies, and collaborating in diverse teams. I bring additional value as a bilingual developer (English/Spanish) with strong communication skills.
